elements.name: static_web_servers
elements.title: Static Web Servers
elements.description:
Define your Static Web Servers. You can add up to 10 servers.

Its important to understand that "Static Web Servers" are for Production / Compiled Web Application Builds that Do Not Require a backend such as NodeJS, Python, C#, Java, but only serves static files. (e.g. .html, .css, .js, ...)
